meaningMnemonic: What do you get if you lend a <radical>spirit</radical> your <radical>umbrella</radical>? <kanji>Thanks</kanji>, of course! Especially if that spirit is Totoro, the spirit of the forest.
readingMnemonic: So what did you receive as a <kanji>thanks</kanji>? You open it up, and there's a <reading>ray</reading> (れい) gun inside!
